definitions: relating to the art of placing or arranging buildings or other sites auspiciously

examples.text: the Chinese geomantic system of feng shui

shortDefinitions: relating to art of placing or arranging buildings auspiciously

definitions: relating to divination from the configuration of a handful of earth or random dots

examples.text: divination by means of geomantic points

shortDefinitions: relating to divination from configuration of handful of earth
